Text:
Thanks for sharing. I've seen couple of versions of Bronte's novel, and I'm curious about this one. My favorite version is the one directed by Peter Kosminsky (with Juliette Binoche and Ralph Fiennes) but I liked also the '39 classic (with Laurence Olivier).
I must say I find Andrea Arnold's preference to shoot the movie in 4:3 rather odd, although Fish Tank was also shot in this aspect ratio...
